ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: and(not(ISCHANGED( GGP_Number__c )),$Profile.Id != '00e30000001YLF7', (or( RecordType.Name='VOC' , RecordType.Name='VOC Read Only' )),(or(Reliability_Customer_Expectations__c = '' , Reliability_Summary__c='')), (or(text( Reliability_Customer_Rating__c) ='Yellow - Somewhat Dissatisfied' , text( Reliability_Customer_Rating__c) = 'Red - Very Dissatisfied')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check that Reliability Customer Expectations and Reliability Summary fields are filled.
